map
Class State

java.lang.Object
  map.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<State>
public class State
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<State>, java.lang.Cloneable

Objects of this class represent the states of the map.

See Also:

getMilitaryStrength

public int getMilitaryStrength()
Returns the miltary strength of a state given by s + 5 * t, where s is the number of soldiers of the state, t is the number of tanks of the state, and c is some number greater than 1.

The military strength of the state.

isReinforce

public boolean isReinforce()
Returns whether this state requires reinforcements or not.

Returns:
True is the state needs reinforcements, and false otherwise.

log_state

public void log_state()
This method causes a clone of this state to be appended to the state's log. This allows for a future review of a state's state at the time the method was called.
